name: Mom I'm Scared
description:
Mom I'm Scared is an exploration/escape game set in a child's nightmare.

The young boy lost his father in a work accident and had to move away from the city with his mother. Devoid of all marks in this new environment, he is haunted by nightmares every night. Thankfully his favorite bunny plushie helps him through them. What happens when, in one of his nightmares, it disappears?

It's up to you to find out and help him get to his bunny before his nightmare does.

[THIS IS A SCHOOL PROJECT]

Language: French

Possible Warnings: Flashing lights, rats, thalassophobia
